value:
Chad is clever, but he doesn't like
to study. Raigh is a genius, but he's
impossible to get along with.$k$pWill those two be all right without
me around?

We originally lived in a small
orphanage, but the war with Bern
threw things into chaos.$k$pI really hope everybody is doing
all right.

I saw you talking to some pretty
important-looking people just now!$k$pThanks for everything you do. If
there's anything I can do to help out,
just let me know!

I managed to get my hands on a
cartload of baked goods... You want
some? I'm happy to share!

Do you have a moment? I'm not
quite sure I understand this part of
the book I'm reading... Can you help?

Hello there, $Nu!
My name's Lugh. I'm glad to
meet you.

I see... So this is the spirit of
magic.
I'm doing the best that I can!

Maybe I'm not cut out for
this after all...

Wow! What is this power?
I can use it? Thank you!

Hello, I'm Lugh! I may look a little
inexperienced, but I'm good with
magic. It's great to be here!

Hey, $Nu...
How am I doing in battle?
Am I pulling my weight?$k$pI don't really like all this fighting...so
I got a bit concerned that I might be
causing you some consternation.$k$pWhere I come from, they killed the
caretaker of our orphanage, and I
found myself fighting for revenge.$k$pIt was scary... But once I thought
about Raigh, Chad, and the others...
that gave me the courage I needed.$k$pI want to do everything I can for you,
you see. I like you a lot. You can
count on me!
えいっ
それっ
うああっ！
このままじゃ…
I won't run anymore.
I've made up my mind!
For the people I hold dear!
I promise—I'll be OK!
Sorry, Chad... Raigh...
Ahaha
I'm Lugh! I'm here because I can use magic! Not a lot, but I'm learning.
Woah! Did I do something odd?
Before I knew it, everyone had vanished from the orphanage…
My dream is for all wars to end. Maybe one day everyone will live in peace together.
If I don't survive... Promise me you'll care for the children.
Raigh is rough around the edges. I worry about him...
I don't want to be protected. I just want to protect! That includes you.
Of course.
Are you calling me?
I'll do whatever I can.
